triples.name: Explainable artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: XAI is the core subject of the survey on argumentative approaches to explainability.

triples.name: Argumentation framework
triples.relevance: Argumentation frameworks are the formalized structures used to build XAI approaches surveyed in the paper.

triples.name: Argument mining
triples.relevance: Argument mining provides computational methods for extracting argumentative structures used in XAI systems.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: AI is the broader field context within which explainable AI and argumentative approaches are developed.

triples.name: Mechanistic interpretability
triples.relevance: Interpretability is a key goal of XAI approaches, related to understanding neural network mechanisms.
